Headline: #44 Wallace Temporary Reroute at Wallace/29th.
ShortDescription: #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Wallace, 31st, Halsted, 26th, due to street blockage near Wallace/29th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Wallace, 31st, Halsted, 26th then resume their normal route on Racine, due to street blockage near Wallace/29th.

Allow extra travel time.
